Major_Arcs.title: Circus Arrival and Initial Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the circus setting and the main character Paul Bunyan, alongside initial reactions from townspeople and a family visiting the circus. It sets a lighthearted tone before transitioning to conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and the arrival of the circus in town.

narrative_arcs.title: Man Hears News of the Circus
Family Reacts to Giraffe at Circus

sub_scenes.title: Trouble in the Tent and Paul Bunyan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A shift to conflict as a man investigates trouble in a tent, leading to a fight and Paul Bunyan revealing his identity and strength.

narrative_arcs.title: Pistol Threat and Revelation of Identity

sub_scenes.title: Circus Owner's Offer
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the fight leads to the circus owner offering Paul Bunyan a job as a strongman.

narrative_arcs.title: Gratitude and Revelation of Past Conflict

Major_Arcs.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge and Paul Bunyan's Heroism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Matto Grasso's attempts to sabotage Paul Bunyan and the circus, and Paul Bunyan's heroic efforts to thwart these plans.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge Plot
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Matto Grasso's envy and his plans for revenge against Paul Bunyan.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Debut and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action

sub_scenes.title: The Ape Incident
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso's second revenge plan involving releasing an ape, and Paul Bunyan's intervention and subsequent chase.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's Frustration and a New Scheme
The Ape's Release and Paul's Intervention
Entering the Arena and a New Plan
The Hat Trick and Continued Escape

Major_Arcs.title: Impromptu Fight and Paul Bunyan's Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features an unscheduled fight breaking out in the circus arena, Paul Bunyan's unexpected participation, and his decision to leave the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Unscheduled Circus Spectacle
sub_scenes.description: A spontaneous fight erupts in the circus ring, surprising the audience.

sub_scenes.title: Paul Bunyan's Refusal and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: Despite being offered the strongman position, Paul Bunyan declines and decides to return to the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Encounter with the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc begins a new storyline focusing on Marco Polo's adventures, specifically his encounter with the Awful Ogress of Tibet and subsequent events.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Marco Polo's Adventure
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Marco Polo and the setup for his encounter with the Ogress.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Awful Ogress of Tibet

sub_scenes.title: Gratitude and Guidance
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo helps an old man who gives him a dagger and directions to Hi-Toun.

narrative_arcs.title: Gratitude and Guidance from the Old Man

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Royal Welcome
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo arrives at Hi-Toun and meets the King, learning about the city's sorrow.

narrative_arcs.title: The King's Grief Over Daughter Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo encounters the Ogress disguised as a woman in distress, leading to his capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with a Starving Woman and the Witch's Castle
Entering the Mysterious Castle and Meeting the 'Children'
Imprisonment as a 'Guest' and Ogress Revelation
Confrontation with Tusked Mice and Ogress's Claws

Major_Arcs.title: Captivity and Escape with the Magic Knife
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the captivity of a man and woman, and their daring escape using a magic knife.

sub_scenes.title: Snake Entrapment
sub_scenes.description: A man is attacked and captured by snakes.

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Threat and Captive's Hope
sub_scenes.description: An ogress threatens captives, but a young man remembers a hidden weapon.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unexpected Attack and Its Success
Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Reward
sub_scenes.description: The escaped pair returns to the woman's father, receiving a joyful welcome and a reward.

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Betrayal's Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of buried treasure, betrayal, revenge, and justice in a penal colony setting.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony Setup
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the treasure story by the Treasure Keeper and setting the scene in a British penal colony.

narrative_arcs.title: Penal Colony Routine and Officer's Request

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Deal
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner proposes a deal to Captain Brooking involving buried treasure for escape.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Vow of Revenge
sub_scenes.description: The prisoner realizes he has been betrayed and vows revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Vow of Revenge
Years Later - Freedom and Undying Vengeance

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate and Salvation Through Forgiveness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a haunted estate, a ghost seeking peace, and a living man's journey towards salvation through forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Haunting
sub_scenes.description: Setting up the haunted estate mystery and introducing Dr. Styx.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Matthews' Estate and Haunting

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Warning at Matthews Place
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup arrives at the haunted estate and receives a warning.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring Alvin's Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Northrup encounters the ghost and engages in a physical and verbal confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Salvation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The conflict resolves with forgiveness and brotherly love, leading to the ghosts finding peace.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Guidance and Receiving Advice on Salvation
Revelation of Rosalind as the Key to Salvation
Forced Confrontation and Accusation of Cowardice
Physical Restraint and Assertion of Superior Strength
Accusation and Identification of the Destroyer
Request for a Favor: Permitting Rest
Acceptance of Brotherly Love and Release
Vincent's Remorse and Rosalind's Ultimate Forgiveness

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Voyages and Tragic Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, his search for the Northwest Passage, and the tragic mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Introduction and First Voyage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Henry Hudson's story and the Dutch East India Company's proposal for his first voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Return
sub_scenes.description: Details of Hudson's first voyage, crew discontent, and the return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Growing Discontent and Demand to Turn South
Entering the Hudson River and False Hope
Hudson's Resignation and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's second, ill-fated voyage, leading to mutiny and his abandonment.

narrative_arcs.title: Hudson's Second Expedition and Icy Route
Resumption of Voyage and Crew's Grievances

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Rescue of Ali-Ben-Ali's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of the Arabian Knight, Hassan, and his mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from Tartar horsemen.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Mission Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Arabian Knight and his mission briefing by the Caliph.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight Introduction and Chase
Summoned by the Caliph and The Mission Briefing

sub_scenes.title: Tracking the Tartars
sub_scenes.description: Hassan tracks the Tartars, encountering a deserted oasis and a warning traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: The Deserted Oasis and Tracking the Tartars
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Revealing the Rescue and Parting Ways
Kurgan's Recognition and Grant of Safe Passage
